read = lambda: map(int, raw_input().split())
read_s = lambda: map(str, raw_input().split())

def is_pali(n):
    return str(n) == ''.join(reversed(str(n)))

def is_prime(n):
    import math
    for i in range(2, int(math.sqrt(n) + 1)):
        if n % i == 0:
            return False
    return True

n, = read()
while True:
    if is_pali(n):
        if is_prime(n):
            print n
            break
    n += 1
